attributes.action: Affordable quality homes for 3 generations under one roof
attributes.additional_details: Change the housing paradigm: Encourage property developers to use 'executive housing plots' for a new design of 3 generation home. Provide subsidised 100 year mortages for the building of homes to house 3 generations in comfort and security. Exempt such homes from council tax when they house an eldery relative that would otherwise need sheltered housing/residential care. For more details see http://www.martingoodyerblog.com/blog/article.aspx?id=136&title=Affordable_quality_homes_for_3_generations_under_one_roof
